recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with a pizza stone if available
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border
Arrange mozzarella slices over the sauce
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with minced garlic
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly
Remove from oven and top with fresh basil leaves
Slice and serve hot

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka masala for 30 minutes
Heat butter in a large pan over medium heat
Sauté onion until softened, then add garlic and ginger
Add remaining tikka masala spice and cook for 1 minute
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned
Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes
Add heavy cream and simmer for another 5 minutes
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro
Serve with basmati rice or naan bread

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry romaine lettuce
Tear or chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces
Place lettuce in a large salad bowl
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat evenly
Add croutons and most of the Parmesan cheese
Toss again gently
Top with remaining Parmesan and black pepper
Garnish with anchovy fillets if desired
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Drain excess fat from the beef
Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens
Warm taco shells according to package instructions
Fill each shell with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and onions
Add a dollop of sour cream
Serve with salsa and hot sauce on the side

recipes.title: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, then drain
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar to make sauce
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat
Cook chicken until done, then set aside
Add remaining oil and scramble eggs in the wok
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add drained noodles and sauce, toss to combine
Return chicken to wok and add bean sprouts
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until heated through
Garnish with peanuts, green onions, and lime wedges

recipes.title: Greek Moussaka
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and bake for 20 minutes
Brown ground meat with onion and garlic in a large pan
Add tomatoes, wine, cinnamon, salt, and pepper
Simmer meat sauce for 20 minutes
Layer half the eggplant in a baking dish
Add meat sauce, then remaining eggplant
Pour béchamel sauce over the top
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese
Bake for 45 minutes until golden brown
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
In another bowl, cream butter and both sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract
Gradually stir in flour mixture
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes
Transfer to wire rack to cool completely

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
instructions: Bring broth to a boil in a large pot
Add lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and chilies
Simmer for 5 minutes to infuse flavors
Add mushrooms and tomato, cook for 3 minutes
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes
Remove from heat and add fish sauce and lime juice
Remove lemongrass and galangal pieces
Garnish with fresh cilantro
Serve hot

recipes.title: Lasagna Bolognese
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Brown beef and sausage with onion and garlic
Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and herbs
Simmer sauce for 30 minutes
Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions
Mix ricotta, egg, 1 cup mozzarella, and 1/4 cup Parmesan
Spread thin layer of sauce in a 9x13 baking dish
Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, meat sauce, and cheese
Repeat layers, ending with sauce and remaining cheese
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes
Remove foil and bake 25 more minutes until bubbly
Let rest for 15 minutes before serving

recipes.title: Guacamole
instructions: Cut avocados in half and remove pits
Scoop avocado flesh into a bowl
Add lime juice and salt
Mash with a fork to desired consistency
Fold in onion, tomatoes, cilantro, and jalapeño
Add garlic and mix well
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed
Serve immediately with tortilla chips

recipes.title: Chicken Teriyaki
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, garlic, and ginger in a bowl
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until golden brown on both sides
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes
Mix cornstarch with water to make a slurry
Add slurry to pan and stir until sauce thickens
Remove from heat
Slice chicken and drizzle with sauce
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions
Serve with steamed rice

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat
Add onions and sugar, cook for 30-40 minutes until caramelized
Stir frequently to prevent burning
Add wine and deglaze the pot
Add beef broth, bay leaves, and thyme
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Preheat broiler
Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls
Top each with baguette slices and cheese
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch
Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add bell peppers and snap peas
Continue stir-frying for 2-3 minutes
Pour sauce over vegetables
Toss everything together until sauce thickens
Serve hot over rice or noodles

recipes.title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar in a bowl
Make a well in the center
Pour in milk, egg, and melted butter
Mix until smooth (small lumps are okay)
Heat a griddle or pan over medium heat
Grease with butter
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Cook until bubbles form on surface
Flip and cook until golden brown
Serve warm with maple syrup and berries

recipes.title: Shakshuka
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Sauté onion and bell pepper until softened
Add garlic and spices, cook for 1 minute
Add crushed tomatoes and season with salt and pepper
Simmer for 10-15 minutes until sauce thickens
Make 6 wells in the sauce
Crack an egg into each well
Cover and cook until eggs are set but yolks are still runny
Sprinkle with feta cheese and parsley
Serve with crusty bread for dipping
